Accessory Merchant Uska:

Go to Immortal Plateau to the south of Frozen Waterfalls. Defeat Maraku Werewolf Chieftains, Kasha Spiders, Kasha Blade Spiders and Evil Eye Patrols roaming there.

When the job is done, go to Captain Bathis in Gludio. He was looking for a warrior who can deal with Maraku Werewolves. I'm sure he will give you a reward.

Well, are you ready? I think that slaying 30 monsters will be enough. Will you try?
